Package cesur.zakaria.pokemonprojectzakariafarih.model.fight

Class Bot

java.lang.Object
cesur.zakaria.pokemonprojectzakariafarih.model.fight.Trainer
cesur.zakaria.pokemonprojectzakariafarih.model.fight.Bot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Bot extends Trainer
The Bot class represents a computer-controlled opponent in a Pokemon battle. It extends the Trainer class and provides methods for the bot to choose actions during a fight.
See Also:

    • Bot

      public Bot(String name, Pokemon[] pokemons)
      Constructs a new Bot with the given name and Pokemon team.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the bot.
      pokemons - An array of Pokemon representing the bot's team.

  • Method Details

    • fight

      public Capacity fight()
      Simulates a fight action by the bot. The bot randomly selects one of its usable capacities and returns it.
      Returns:
      A Capacity representing the capacity chosen by the bot for the fight action.

      Switches the current active Pokemon of the trainer to the one at the specified index.

      Parameters:
